name: Hillary Owens
text: This particular store is making a terrible name for Pizza Hut. We placed an order at 3:00pm and they said it would take about 45 mins. We waited around until 4:15 and decided to call back wondering where our pizza was. They said they …More

name: David Allardyce
text: Two and a half hour wait to get a cold hard pizza. One of the pizzas had sauce and cheese on one side.... but not the other. The answer I got from the stoner working there, on where my pizza was, was that the driver left 15 minutes. …More

name: Herman Oxborrow
text: They have never burned or mishandled my food. They are prompt and reasonably polite. If I wanted a nice atmosphere and a view I wouldn't go to a place that focuses on delivery.

name: Samantha B
text: I ordered one pizza to be well done to be delivered. It arrived and it was cold and just barely cooked and was 30 minutes later than the time I was told. I called and complained and they said either I can have a credit toward another pizza …More

name: Cary
text: I have tried to order from here a few times but the delivery time is always too long. One time at 5pm it was a two hour wait and 1 hour and 15 minutes the last time I tried. That was at 7:45 pm - way past rush hour. No other pizza place in the city takes that long. It's like they have no drivers working there.

name: Sabrina Jane
text: I had my pizzas delivered while I was at work at a clients house. Not only did they NOT follow any of the special requests I asked (to call, not knock since they have a super reactive dog and I wanted my pizza extra crispy with the spinach …More

name: Bumblebee Hill
text: THEY NEVER ANSWER THEIR PHONES! Good luck ever getting a pizza. What a joke. You'll be on hold for 30 min before they just hang up on you.

name: Shelley Rossi
text: Placed an order and when I got the email confirmation it showed the wrong items ordered. I called the number - which is their call center - and waited on hold for 5 minutes. By the time the woman got to me and then called over to the store, they had already made my order and said nothing could be changed. Don't order online. Call. :-(

name: Jalil Rasul
text:
I wish I could give it No starts at all.
Ordered Pizza around 10:00AM expected delivery time was @ 11:15AM, (fair deal to wait and study for my upcoming final) at 12:20PM. However I called back in to …More

name: Garrett Landry
text: They have good pizza and have a good value. They are delivery and carry out only. Parking can be pretty rough though. If you can afford delivery, do it.

name: David Halpin
text: They often get the order wrong and the delivery times are way off the estimates. Multiple calls to have a manager call me back and they never return the call. I complained to Pizza Hutt and hey said they are a franchise that they don't control. So, they can't do anything. I will be switching to Dominos for now on.

name: Drew D
text: Very busy and online wait time lied. Had to wait 45 min total vs the countdown started at just 20. Lots of pizzas were sitting in the hot box for delivery the whole time... Pizza was spongey

name: Muzafar Chakhalidze
text: I ordered pizza at 10:00 they told me that it would come at 11:15. I waited until 11:30 and called them to see whats up they told me it would be more minutes. At 11:45 i called them again and they tell me the driver is already back and that …More

name: John Widner
text: Thanks guys. I was going to get a deliver from this place but thanks to your reviews I decided not to waist my time and call somewhere else.

name: akshay bagi
text: Tasty. Got good offers

name: Roberto Caldera
text: They are close.

name: Alex Kinney
text: Their website messed up and they were very helpful working with me to fix it (saved me 30$) I really appreciate it!

name: Robert Catone
text: It's a Pizza Hut

name: Matthew Chun
text:
Delivery time was sadly expected to take a little over one hour, yet it took over 2 hours to arrive.
This was just for a dinner box. Called in after an hour and a half of waiting to be told the food hadn't been started yet and that it would be arriving soon.

name: Randy Criswell
text: BIG waste of time.Bunch of kids running the place.Not one even in the store.Just stood outside smoking.
